actions.text: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A047) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 252 (Roll no. 599).
Amendment (A047) offered by Mr. DeSaulnier to the Rules amendment (A001).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A047) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 252 (Roll no. 599).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A047) offered by Mr. DeSaulnier to the Rules amendment (A001).

amends_amendment.description: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.
amends_amendment.purpose: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.

description: An amendment No. 54 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to direct states and metropolitan planning organizations to develop publicly available criteria to prioritize transportation projects.
purpose: Amendment sought to require State and regional transportation plans to include project descriptions and to score projects based on criteria developed by the State or the region, not the Federal Government.
